options.name: Xenobiologist
options.description: Gain +1 Science and +1 Xenology. You can identify the species, abilities, and basic biology of alien creatures with a successful check.

options.name: Anatomical Knowledge
options.description: Gain +1 Science. You know the vulnerable points of different species. Your attacks against creatures you've studied deal an additional 1d4 damage.

options.name: Xeno-Adaptation
options.description: Gain +1 Xenology. You can quickly adapt to alien environments, gaining advantage on Constitution checks to resist environmental hazards.

options.name: Biological Analysis
options.description: Gain +1 Science and +1 Medicine. After studying a creature for 1 minute, you learn its resistances, immunities, and vulnerabilities.

options.name: Action : Exploit Weakness
options.description: Target a creature you can see and make a Science check. If successful, you identify a key weakness, and attacks against that creature ignore resistance and treat immunity as resistance for 1 minute.

options.name: Reaction : Predict Behavior
options.description: When a creature you've studied makes an attack or uses an ability, you can predict its effects and warn an ally, giving them advantage on their saving throw or defense.

options.name: Alien Biology Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Xenology and +1 Science. You can create specialized treatments, antidotes, or compounds effective against specific alien species.

options.name: Action : Tranquilizing Strike
options.description: Make an attack with a specially prepared tranquilizer. If it hits, the target must make a Constitution save or fall unconscious for 1 hour. This works on creatures normally immune to sleep effects.

options.name: Adaptive Immunity
options.description: Gain +1 Science and immunity to disease. You have advantage on saving throws against poison and biological attacks.

options.name: Master Xenobiologist
options.description: Gain +1 Science, +1 Xenology, and +1 Medicine. You can mimic the biological abilities of creatures you've studied, temporarily gaining one natural ability, attack, or defense of such a creature once per day.
